titles.title: To ensure that certain members of the United States Armed Forces are not subject to secondary airport security screening.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Homeland Security.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Security, Infrastructure Protection, and Cybersecurity.

committee.subcommittee: Economic Security, Infrastructure Protection, and Cybersecurity
committee.name: House Homeland Security

bill.summary: 9/13/2005--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Homeland Security to issue regulations to ensure that no secondary airport screening is conducted of a member of the Armed Forces who: (1) is on active duty; (2) is carrying orders that require travel; (3) is in uniform; and (4) has valid military identification.
